name: Hare Brained
description:
In Development

*Known Bug* sometimes collisions don't register

Physics game about love and war. Pull your hare back and let go to sling it

When two hares run into each other, they have a leveret. Unless the hare being hit has 1 health. Then it just dies. 

When one hare kills another it gains a life. 

Oh yeah, and if a hare hits a stronger opponent, it will lose 1 health in the attack (damage is still applied to defending hare).

Once the enemy hares are gone, you win. Simple.
